original_title: Sri Lanka tourist arrivals rise to 151,000 in November
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka has welcomed 151,496 tourists in November 2023, up 153 percent from a year earlier, with India bringing in 20 percent of the visitors, data from the tourist promotion office said.
Sri Lanka has welcomed 1.276 million tourists up to November 2023, up from 719,978 last year.
Sri Lanka got 30,339 visitors in November, 24,912 from Ukraine, 12,331 from Germany, 11,526 from UK, 11,526 from Australia and 6,673 from China.
Sri Lanka welcomed around 180,000 to 190,000 visitors in November before the 2020 coronavirus crisis. December arrivals ranged around 240,000 to 250,000.
Sri Lanka is expecting around 1.5 million visitors in 2023. (Colombo/Dec06/2023)
